content: Third quarter adjusted Advisory Fees of $489 million, or 31% lower year-over-year, reflecting a decrease in the number of fees and the size of fees earned as market volumes remains low. Third quarter adjusted other revenue net was a loss of approximately $1 million reflecting lower performance of our investment funds portfolio, which is used as a hedge for our DCCP  commitment due to overall market decline. Third quarter adjusted non-compensation costs of $91 million, were up 9% versus a year-ago, primarily driven by an increase in Travel and Related expenses as well as higher professional fees.
